name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.HearingScheduled.Respondent
titleEn: A hearing on the application has been scheduled
titleCy: Mae gwrandawiad ar y cais wedi’i drefnu
descriptionEn: Your hearing has been scheduled for ${hearingNoticeApplicationDateEn} View the hearing notice.
descriptionCy: Mae eich gwrandawiad wedi’i drefnu ar gyfer ${hearingNoticeApplicationDateCy} Gweld yr hysbysiad o wrandawiad.
